At the end of the struggle, democracy will triumph #Wagram
For having led for more than four years the fight of the Republic against a murderous terrorism, I have no doubt #Wagram
Islamist terrorism has become a false state led by real killers. He deviates a religion, Islam, to propagate his hatred
This enemy is cruel. He indoctrinates, enrols and sends his recruits to strike innocent #Wagram
He forbids the future and goes so far as to deny humanity. Democracy embodies the opposite of what it is: freedom, tolerance, respect, equality
The victory of the democracies is inescapable because they have a force that gathers energies and becomes irresistible: the freedom
Before reaching us, they attacked their own religion. Everywhere Muslims have been the victims of these #Wagram Islamists
To democracies, it launches a global challenge. That's why France is committed, as far as here #Wagram
By fighting in a foreign country, our armies defend us. Because it's the same threat, because they're the same #Wagram murderers
France will stubbornly continue this fight. She has for her the valor of her soldiers, the courage of her police and her gendarmes
I do everything to protect the French but they owe them the truth: the threat is there. It will last #Wagram
We must face it with courage, firmness and coolness. Ensure security, but never give up living as we want
In the face of terrorist barbarism, only two tracks and two are available to #Wagram democracies
The first is that of the State of exception. Freedom is not a handicap. She is our #Wagram asset
The idea of ​​Motherland is always to know why we are fighting and France is committed to freedom #Wagram
East Asia Summit in Laos https://t.co/sPJHtL9QUZ https://t.co/hnpspQejQh
This simple, valuable, essential principle, some have not understood #Wagram
I hear them beating the stands using all the bidding to better distinguish themselves inside their camp #Wagram
The only camp that's worth is the #Wagram Republic
In these matters, the imagination takes troubling turns. To defend the right, we would have to start by lowering it #Wagram
Resort to administrative internment in camps Locking up suspects indiscriminately and without judgment #Wagram
No, constitutional principles are not "legal quibbles"! #Wagram
A legal quibble, freedom of expression? freedom of worship? #Wagram
A legal quibble, the presumption of innocence, very convenient to brandish when it comes to pleading for one's own account? #Wagram
Thank you America - great #CommanderInChiefForum polls! https://t.co/Rcu6KaRGCB
If we want to rally the Democrats against terrorism, do not start making them lose their #Wagram soul
The other way, the only one that works, the only way, is the rule of law. This is the choice I made in the name of France #Wagram
Outside, it is in compliance with international law that our armed forces intervene #Wagram
Inside, it is with our laws, in accordance with our constitutional rules, that we track down #Wagram jihadists
Preventive measures, difficult decisions, we took them, with the Government of @manuelvalls and with the support of Parliament
Who can say that @BCazeneuve, whose solidity and determination arouse respect, does not care to protect the French?
Who can say that we do not want to use every possible means to hunt down our enemies? #Wagram
9000 police and gendarmes positions will have been created during the five-year period. Should we remind that the previous had removed 13000?
In four years have been passed three anti-terrorism laws to condemn acts committed abroad by French jihadists
No one can conscientiously promise that there will be more attack #Wagram
What on the other hand, I can guarantee the French is that all the power of the state will be committed to overcome the enemy #Wagram
But I have a deep conviction: our cohesion is our protection. This is the challenge of the coming time #Wagram
If the French divide, if Europe is torn apart, then the outcome of the battle against terrorism will move away #Wagram
I'm part of a generation, born in the mid-1950s that saw democracy as a universal-oriented #Wagram
What appeared to be the best established is in doubt. What seemed obvious, becomes a topic of debate #Wagram
RT @LKYSch: UN Chief Ban "will be remembered for dealing w/ so many global crises w/ remarkable calm & equanimity."-@Mahbubani_K https://t.…
That's why I'm acting to preserve and strengthen our cohesion. It's so much easier to summon #Wagram fears
Just as I refuse the state of exception, I will always fight against the state of exclusion #Wagram
The one who dismantles social protection and reduces public services. This fight is the very reason for my #Wagram engagement
Secularism is not a mystique, it is not the religion of the state against religions but a set of rules of law #Wagram
The state guarantees to everyone the right to believe or not to believe, the right to exercise one's religion, the right to express one's religious opinions
The Law of Separation of Churches and the State was conceived at a time when Islam only concerned a tiny part of the population
The question is to know if the principles posed more than a century ago remain adapted whereas Islam is the 2nd religion of France
The answer is yes, clearly yes. The vast majority of our Muslim compatriots give us every day the proof #Wagram
Nothing in the idea of ​​secularism is opposed to the practice of Islam in France, provided that it complies with the law #Wagram
I affirm, as long as I am President, there will be no legislation of circumstance, as inapplicable as unconstitutional #Wagram
What we need to succeed together is the construction of an Islam of France #Wagram
The 1st decision is to set up a Foundation for Islam that supports cultural, educational and social initiatives #Wagram
The second will be to create a national association to find funding for the construction of mosques, the training of imams
The Republic can not be satisfied with a situation where the majority of imams are trained abroad and sometimes do not speak our language
I mean that every Frenchman, whatever his confession, his origins, his conditions of acquisition of nationality, is here at home
The Republic is one and indivisible. She does not distinguish between her #Wagram children
National cohesion is also our social model. I am the guarantor because it is the common heritage of the French #Wagram
He is himself threatened. There, is the other danger. The social model must be constantly modernized, reformed, completed in order to be adapted
A strong country is a united nation. This is the meaning of the reforms I have been conducting since 2012 #Wagram
Our pension system has been saved and now takes into account the hard work of #Wagram
New rights have been created. I'm thinking of the personal activity account, the youth guarantee, the #Wagram activity bonus
The fight against discrimination has been reinforced with the possibility that victims commit group actions #Wagram
In this cohesion policy, an institution plays of course an irreplaceable role: it is the #Wagram school
It is no longer a question of repairing the school after the blows that had been brought to it during the last five years #Wagram
It must be allowed to accomplish its mission by making it more fair, more innovative, more open to the #Wagram society
School is democracy's response to ignorance, misinformation, #Wagram conspiracy
That's why we reintroduced to school learning of secularism and civic morality #Wagram
That we have strengthened pedagogy around freedom of expression, makes equality between girls and boys a primary issue
But there is no democracy that can defend itself in the long term without the commitment of the members who make it up #Wagram
While authoritarian regimes are held in fear, democracies hold by #Wagram membership
Hope runs out, distrust wins, extremism returns #Wagram
Its supporters pretending to incarnate the people against the elites from whom they come are discrediting democracy itself.

I warn those who, candidates for the exercise of power, would want to question the presidential function #Wagram
From this point of view, the Fifth Republic, facing external dangers as well as the internal threat, gives the means to act #Wagram
Democracy has nothing to fear when the Parliament controls it within a time frame provided by the #Wagram Constitution

The conception of democracy and the place of France, in Europe and in the world #Wagram
It's the same set. I was going to say one block. It's unity that will make our #Wagram strength
It is the trust in ourselves, in our values, that will allow us to triumph over #Wagram terrorism
Our identity is our history, our culture, our way of life. She is neither happy nor unhappy #Wagram

It builds on the patient and brilliant contribution of successive generations who have built our nation #Wagram
It is not frozen in time. It's in perpetual motion #Wagram

The peoples of the world knew that by attacking France we were attacking freedom, democracy, culture, a way of life

Calling for national cohesion, carrying a collective project, defending the very idea of ​​France, justify more than ever the gathering
I will not turn away from this goal that has animated me throughout the five-year #Wagram
I felt more than any other what France represents #Wagram
I will never let France spoil, be altered or reduced, it is the fight of a life #Wagram
We are France, a country whose choices will be decisive for the future of Europe, for its very existence #Wagram
